Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: *disorder: (n) a state of disturbance or confusion*   I think part of things being a disorder is that they don’t  work. I mean, at some levels for some period of time it might *look* like it’s working. But usually, eventually, they show their true colors. In physical damage. In mental and emotional damage. Your struggle is real and important, no matter how it’s named <3   The logical mind *v* emotional mind showdown in my head is a constant epic melee. I heard someone say the other week, “My head says I’m fine and my heart says I’m broken. The longest journey I’ve ever taken was 18 inches - from my head to my heart.
